p: The data were processed by ANOVA using the PROC GLM in SAS [ 32]. The differences among the groups regarding the VFAs in the caeca, the intestinal morphometry, and enzymatic activity were analyzed by the one-way ANOVA according to the following model: Yij = m + Di + eij, where Y is a single observation, m is the general mean, D is the effect of the diet (i = SBM, HI25 or HI50), and e is the error.
